name: Sisyphus - The Game
description:
A game by Christopher Matt & Lilian Cartellier

Check out Christopher's work at https://christophermatt.fr/

Made during the Ludum Dare 50 (theme : Delay the Inevitable). 

Buy Sisyphus some time by building objects on the hill to make it longer for the ball to fall.

Use the arrow keys to move the camera and the mouse to drag and drop objects on the hill.

Unfortunately the Greek language isn't available on browsers. For the complete, poorly translated Greek experience, download the windows, mac or linux build
